page.title: 15BIOGRAPHY.
page.content: At"The Barretts" lives Dodie Smith dramatist & novelist whose plays include Autumn Crocus written 1930 and Dear Octupus.Her lst.novel I Capture the Castle was written in 1949.She is perhaps best known for her childrens book 'The 101 Dalmatians' which became world famous when Walt Disney made it into an animated film. Dodie Smith's last books have been her 4 volume autobiography.She now lives quietly with her husband and pets. "Colemans{Farm"}a large 17th. century house is the home of Admiral Sir Andrew Lewis,Lord Lieutenant of Essex since 1978. During his naval career Sir.Andrew commanded H.M.S. Kent & H.M.S. Girdle Ness.He was 2nd.Sea Lord from l970-72 and C-in-C of Naval Home command from l972-74.His hobbies include:fishing,shooting,reading and tending his large garden.
